title: defconfig
description: A defconfig as built by the continuous integration system

version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

job.description: The job associated with this object

kernel.description: The kernel associated with this object

defconfig.description: The name of the defconfig as reported by the continuous integration system

defconfig_full.description: The full name of the defconfig with config fragments information

arch.description: The architecture of the defconfig built

build_time.description: The time taken to build this defconfig

git_url.description: The URL of the git web interface where the code used to build can be found

git_commit.description: The git SHA of the commit used for the build

git_describe.description: The name of the git describe command

build_log.description: Name of the build log file in text format

build_platform.description: An array with info about the build platform

compiler_version.description: Description string of the compiler used

kernel_config.description: Name of the kernel config file used

kernel_image.description: Name of the kernel image created

system_map.description: Name of the system map file

file_server_url.description: The URL where boot log files, or other related files, are stored

file_server_resource.description: The server path where the boot related files are stored
